titles.title: Welfare to Work Act of 1994
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide employers a refundable credit for hiring AFDC recipients.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1112)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/26/1994--Introduced. Welfare to Work Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable credit for the hiring of qualified former recipients of Aid to Families with Dependent Children (AFDC) under title IV of the Social Security Act. Prohibits replacing existing workers in order to obtain such credit.
